folder: South Avenue & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
South Avenue, west side, 150 feet south of Richmond Terrace. The house belonged to G. DeHart in 1874; to Williams from 1898 to 1907, and to M.A. Sinn in 1917. Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.

September 28, 1924

By William T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: South Avenue - Richmond Terrace

folder: South Avenue & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
18 South Avenue, west side, south of Richmond Terrace. In 1874 (Beers's map) the house belonged to G. De Hart; from 1898 to 1907 to Williams, and in 1917 to M. A. Sinn.

April 22, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: South Avenue - Richmond Terrace
